short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically switches web apps from 'for you' tab to 'following' to prevent distractions from algorithmic brainrot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically switches web apps to 'following' tab from 'for you' to prevent brainrot and distraction. 

Gives more power to users to see what they signed up to see  (by 'following' accounts), not what an algorithm wants them to see (suggested 'for you')
